ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO Attitude and Orbit Data Repository
ResourceHeader.Description: STEREO attitude and orbit data are generated from SPICE kernels and offered here in the following coordinate systems: GEI, GSE, GSM, HCI, HEE, HEEQ, RTN
